items.content_html: A lightweight and interactive To-Do List application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add and delete tasks with a simple and clean interface. Tasks are stored in local storage, so they remain available even after refreshing the page.
items.title: Shubhankar1211/Todo-list: A lightweight and interactive To-Do List application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add and delete tasks with a simple and clean interface. Tasks are stored in local storage, so they remain available even after refreshing the page.
